item.title: Quit this job and shove it: the updated EU legislation on non-EU migrant workers
item.description: Professor Steve Peers, Royal Holloway University of London *Text updated Dec 22 2023, to add a link to the agreed text of the Directive, and April 12 2024, on its final adoptionÂ Photo credit: Lasse Fuss, via Wikimedia commons While the recent agreement on asylum legislation has garnered significant attention, an equally important development occurred with the EU Member States and European Parliament reaching an agreement on amending the ‘single permit Directive,’ a law governing non-EU migrant workers.
